project_descr: The Ebola Virus Disease (EVD) outbreak was first reported to WHO in March 2014. As at 29 October 2014, about 14,000 cases and nearly 5,000 deaths have been recorded mainly from the three most affected countries, Guinea, Liberia and Sierra Leone.
